txt.en: The Dourhands have been lax in their guard and have allowed goblins to roam the slopes of Ered Luin.

<rgb=#00e4ff>This quest has been restored for Legendary Servers!</rgb>

'While this matter of Dourhands and goblins being in league with one another cannot go ignored, we must set our attention on more pressing matters.

'To the south-west, there is an encampment of goblins on the slopes above Frerin's Court. Go there and deal with the lot of them.

'In the meantime, I'm going to look into this Dourhand matter further.'
Goblins can be found to the south-west of Frerin's Court, up on the slopes of the mountains.\n\nDwalin has asked you to deal with the goblins encamped near Thorin's Hall.

'Excellent work, [placeholder]. With the threat of the goblins lessened, we can deal with more sinister matters here in the valley.\n\n'Thank you for all of your hard work. I trust this will prove an ample reward.'
Dwalin can be found in Frerin's Court, north-east of the goblin-camp.\n\nYou should return to Dwalin with news of your success.
'You did a good thing back there!'
'You did a good thing back there!'
Talk to Dwalin at Frerin's Court
